overview:
Chris leads the development and engineering efforts at Evergram, where he is the CTO and a co-founder. Chris values the critical importance of integrating great product and engineering design in order to build and launch products that are simple, elegant, and easy to use.

A proven engineering executive and product strategist with 20 years of experience, Chris possesses an extensive background in mobile apps, desktop applications, synchronization technology, cloud infrastructure, and productivity software markets.

Previously, Chris led the development of the highly rated personal cloud technology at Polkast as its CTO. Prior to that, he served as CTO at Memeo, where he led the design and development of all Memeo products. Earlier in his career, Chris was employed at Apple and was a Chief Architect at Pumatech / Intellisync, a leader in mobile device synchronization, later acquired by Nokia.
